Family Expo and Chili/Mac n' Cheese Cook-off!
This Saturday, March 7th from 9-11 AM Zumbrota-Mazeppa's Early Childhood Program will be hosting its 18th annual Family Expo in the high school gym! This is a FREE WILL DONATION event for children ages birth-kindergarten and their families.
At the event there will be: face painters, glitter tattoos, children's DJ, large inflatable slide, balloon sculptors, and table activities. For adults - several local family service providers will be present to share their involvement with early childhood. In addition, there will be a silent auction and a prize drawing! It's an event you don't want to miss, so please spread the word to your family, friends, and neighbors!

***Following the Family Expo, there is also the 5th Annual
Stabilize ZM Families Chili and Mac n' Cheese Cook-off from 11-12:30 PM in the HS Cafeteria. $5 adults, $3 children (ages 2-12)! Lots to do at school this Saturday. Let's all get out of the house! We hope to see you there.
